channel.title: Changing values
channel.description:
Hey ive recently started altering my server, things to kill etc and have put a crystal key in a store, but it cost 1 coin. i want it to cost a few mill, so can you show me where to put the code and what the code would be example:
go in to pricefile.abc in your server files change the number '1' to how much you want it to be
i have no idea what that is, just a way of how you can say it thanks :P[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 02:17:41 AM[/size][hr]EDIT: i have testscape and project 16....

item.title: Changing values
item.dc:creator: @tezza321 tezza321
item.description:
@tezza321 wrote:

well on other people servers most of the time you can type ::crystalchest and it goes to a chest, use the key on the chest and you get a dragon stone and a rare item.

Read full topic
